description.raw:
This implements the jenkins DSL to build -any- jobs in Linux, Mac and Windows.

To test the new jobs, I've implemented all the ignition transport jobs needed:
http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/_dsl_ignition/

As soon as I've merge this PR I will disable the old manually created jenkins jobs and adapt the bitbucket<->jenkins daemon to use these new ones.
